sentences.en: A garrison was stationed in the town.
All officers wear grade insignia on the left side of garrison caps.
sentences.cn: 所有的军官都在军便帽的左边戴上阶级徽章.

sentences.en: Does your film make a hero of Jim Garrison?
sentences.cn: 您的影片是否将杰姆·加里森塑造成一名英雄人物？

sentences.en: Half the garrison are on duty.
sentences.cn: 有半数卫戍部队在执勤。

sentences.en: Half the garrison is / are on duty.
sentences.cn: 有半数卫戍部队在执勤.

sentences.en: The approaches to the garrison have been heavily mined.
sentences.cn: 通往驻防地的道路上地雷密布。

sentences.en: The besiegers hungered the garrison into surrender.
sentences.cn: 围攻者使守军饿得只好投降.

sentences.en: The garrison fought off the attackers.
The garrison was alert, but too few.
sentences.cn: 驻防的军队是保持警惕的, 但是人数毕竟太少了.

sentences.en: The garrison was called out when news of the enemy’s advance was received.
sentences.cn: 收到敌人推进的情报后，卫戍部队奉命出动。
警卫部队被立即撤了回来.

sentences.en: The German was moving to stiffen up the garrison in Sicily.
sentences.cn: 德军正在加强西西里守军之力量.

sentences.en: The invading army had massacred many of the garrison after capitulation.
sentences.cn: 侵略军在守军投降后仍将多人屠杀了.

sentences.en: The Prussian garrison at Charleroi was falling back.
sentences.cn: 普鲁士驻沙勒罗瓦的部队正在撤退。

sentences.en: The troops came to the relief of the besieged garrison.
sentences.cn: 军队来援救被围的守备军.

phrases.tran_cn: 驻防的，执行卫戍任务的

trans.tran_cn: 守备部队，卫戍部队，要塞，驻防区，加里森
trans.tran_en: a group of soldiers living in a town or fort and defending it
to send a group of soldiers to defend or guard a place
